response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it will be an asset to you as well. Given its worth to you, I propose a price of $1,100,000 for the product. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
